name: hyperspace-fury
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Bypasses and removes any protection effect on the target.

flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of
attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect
and Detect. This attack lowers the user’s Defense.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of
attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect
and Detect. But the user’s Defense stat falls.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:

and Detect. But the user’s Defense stat falls.
